titles.title: SEWAGE GARLIC Imports Tariff Act of 2024
SEWAGE GARLIC Imports Tariff Act of 2024
Stop Eating Waste And Guarantee Excellence for Garlic Assurance and Regulatory Legislation to Inhibit Chinese Imports Tariff Act of 2024
A bill to increase the rate of duty on garlic originating from the People's Republic of China.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
